entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Rain at times mixed with wet snow beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023
